colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG ZHING, RIG GNAS DU MA LA BLO BYANG BA GONG DKAR RDO RJE GDAN PA CHOS MDZAD BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PO ZHES BYAS NAN CHER GSOL BA BTAB PA LA BRTEN NAS, GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SPAS LUNG 'BRAS MO GSHONGS DANG 'DAB CHAGS PA MON BOD GNYIS KYI MTSAMS BSTAN SKYONG CHEN PO'I MGUL KHANG BU ZHES BYA BA'I YUL LJONGS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
